summary: Home video changed the world. The cultural and historical impact of the VHS tape was enormous. This film traces the ripples of that impact by examining the myriad aspects of society that were altered by the creation of videotape.

keywords: sport utility vehicle|videocassette recorder|2010s|reference to the next three days|1980s
title: Rewind This!
